versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Calculates budget allocations using various methodologies

schema.prompt:
Calculate optimal budget allocations using the following information:

Total Income: {{input.totalIncome}}
Fixed Expenses: {{input.fixedExpenses}}
Variable Expenses: {{input.variableExpenses}}
Financial Goals: {{input.financialGoals}}
Preferred Method: {{input.budgetMethod}}

Apply budgeting methodologies:

1. 50/30/20 Rule:
   - 50% needs (essentials)
   - 30% wants (lifestyle)
   - 20% savings and debt repayment
   - Adjustments based on income level

2. Zero-Based Budgeting:
   - Every dollar assigned a purpose
   - Income minus expenses equals zero
   - Priority-based allocation
   - Buffer for unexpected expenses

3. Pay Yourself First:
   - Savings/investment allocation first
   - Essential expenses second
   - Discretionary spending with remainder
   - Emergency fund priority

4. Envelope/Category Method:
   - Spending categories with limits
   - Virtual envelope allocations
   - Rollover or reset options
   - Category priority ranking

5. Custom Hybrid Approach:
   - Combine best elements
   - Adapt to personal situation
   - Flexible percentages
   - Goal-oriented adjustments

Provide:
- Recommended allocations by category
- Percentage and dollar amounts
- Comparison between methods
- Optimization suggestions
- Warning flags for unsustainable allocations
- Adjustment recommendations

Return as structured JSON with keys: recommendedMethod, allocations (object with categories and amounts), percentageBreakdown (object), comparisonTable (array), optimizationTips (array), warningFlags (array), flexibilityBuffer (amount).

props.placeholder: List fixed expenses (rent, insurance, loans, etc.)
Savings goals, debt payoff targets, investments...

translations.description: Calculates optimal budget allocations using various proven methodologies
translations.instructions: Enter your income and expenses. The system will calculate optimal budget allocations using proven methodologies and provide personalized recommendations.
translations.name: Budget Calculator
